short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides shortcut keys to speed up & slow down YouTube video more than 2x.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this  extension you can speed up YouTube videos more than 2x by pressing (Alt + Ctrl + U), to slow down a YouTube video press (Alt + Ctrl + D) and to make it normal press (Alt + Ctrl + N).
